snippet.title: Take Us North Game - Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Take Us North is a single-player narrative adventure survival game that follows the journeys of migrants and asylum seekers on their way to cross the US-Mexico border. Inspired by real-world stories, Take Us North aims to raise awareness about some of the most critical global issues of our time.

Learn more: www.anima-interactive.com/takeusnorth

Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/takeusnorth/take-us-north

Music: Jonah Senzel
Voiceover: Fernanda Echevarría del Rivero
